<Extension()> Public Function ListMetricsAsync (operations As IDatabaseAccountRegionOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, region As String, filter As String, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of Metric))

static member ListMetricsAsync : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.IDatabaseAccountRegionOperations * string * string * string * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.Models.Metric>>

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Name of an Azure resource group.
Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account and region.
